channel.title: DNS on ZySec
channel.description: Recent content in DNS on ZySec

item.title: 1.1.1.1 for Families
item.author: thenytfury@zysec.space (Mohammed Zanil)
item.description: If you haven’t heard of 1.1.1.1 (or commonly known as 1 dot) before, it is a fast and secure free DNS resolver provided by Cloudflare. Its popularity has grown so much so that it has become the second largest DNS resolver after Google. Since they have become very popular, on 1st April 2020, they have launched 1 dot for families.
